item.title: [SPARK-3710] YARN integration test is flaky
item.description:
This has been regularly failing the master build:

Example failure: https://amplab.cs.berkeley.edu/jenkins/job/Spark-Master-SBT/738/AMPLAB_JENKINS_BUILD_PROFILE=hadoop2.2,label=centos/#showFailuresLink

One thing to look at is whether the YARN mini cluster makes assumptions about being able to bind to specific ports.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Hmm. For some the e-mail for this bug ended up in my spam box. Anyway, fix was tracked also in SPARK-2778.
I filed a Yarn bug (YARN-2642), although we can't get rid of the workaround since we need to support existing versions of Yarn.

User 'vanzin' has created a pull request for this issue:
https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/2682
